questions.question: Which animal is this?
questions.explanation: This is a lion. Lions are big cats with golden fur and a mane around their head.

questions.question: What is this animal?
questions.explanation: This is a dolphin. Dolphins are smart animals that live in the ocean and can jump high out of the water.

questions.question: Which animal is this?
questions.explanation: This is a penguin. Penguins are birds that cannot fly but are great swimmers!

questions.question: What is this animal?
questions.explanation: This is a panda. Pandas are bears that love to eat bamboo and have black and white fur.

questions.question: Which animal is this?
questions.explanation: This is a cheetah. Cheetahs are the fastest land animals and have spots on their fur.
